entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Ship nethost in standard native library locations #102587
  • Package Native AOT C++ sources for separate compilation on customer machines #102586
    Future
  • Assert failure(PID 1640 [0x00000668], Thread: 19388 [0x4bbc]): x > base #102585
  • HttpHeaders TryParse can throw #102584
    9.0.0
  • String comparisons with the CompareOptions.StringSort value produce incorrect results under .NET 5 and later #102579
    Future
  • `optRemoveRedundantZeroInits` doesn't know about some safe points #102577
    9.0.0
  • Allow trimming of events when event methods are not reflected over #102576
    9.0.0
  • Blazor Wasm limited to 1 GB of memory #102574
  • NullReferenceException within Thread.StartCallback #102573
  • It is not possible to pass the ID of the garbage collection when the .NET provider is enabled with the GCHeapCollect(0x800000) keyword #102572
  • [API Proposal]: Adding DisposeAsync to HttpResponseMessage and HttpContent #102571
  • If a program is terminated by unhandled exception, its OS process remains #102568
  • [browser][MT] Tests timed out #102559
    9.0.0
  • [Android][infra] Increase the Android test coverage across different OS versions #102555
    9.0.0
  • ConcurrentDictionary.TryGetValue crashes with System.IndexOutOfRangeException: Arg_IndexOutOfRangeException #102545
  • [NativeAOT] baseservices\threading\regressions\beta2\437017\437017 test failing #102544
  • Add a good Binary Serializer #102535
  • Test failure: System.Text.Json.Serialization.Tests.PipeTests.CancelPendingFlushDuringBackpressureThrows #102532

Closed

  • Regressions in System.Collections.Sort #90933
    9.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Hashing #91942
    9.0.0
  • HTTPS requests fail on Ubuntu 24.04 Noble ARM32 due to bundled certs "NotTimeValid" error #101444
    9.0.0
  • Unable to cancel NamedPipeClientStream reads on MacOS #101539
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add Persian language for DayOfWeek of PersianCalendar class #102556
  • Add a STJ feature flag recognizing nullable reference type annotations on properties #100144
    9.0.0
  • Warning origins for warnings originating from event accessors are very confusing #100499
    9.0.0
  • Shake128Tests/Shake256Tests throw PNSE on Fedora 40 #102562
    9.0.0
  • Assert failure(PID 13812 [0x000035f4], Thread: 14128 [0x3730]): promoted_bytes (heap_number) == promoted #100035
  • SwiftErrorHandling: Assertion failed 'killMask == getKillSetForNode(tree)' #102349
    9.0.0
  • JSImport returning Promise that signals reject #102339
    9.0.0
  • Enumerable.Except always creates a new hashset from the second argument #102540
  • Console.ReadKey throws an InvalidOperationException when other console-attached process dies #88697
    9.0.0
  • MediaElement error when play (.net framework) #102538
  • Error MediaElement when play (.net framework) #102537
  • [API Proposal]: System.Globalization.CompareOptions.UseNLS #99646

PullRequests

Created

  • Convert our CryptoKit bindings to use Swift structs at the boundary #102583
    area-System.Security, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Use V5 ESRP task with backing MI + AKV #102582
    needs-area-label
  • Conservative fix for struct stores in optRemoveRedundantZeroInits #102580
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • ILLink: Add EventDefinitionNode to dependency analysis #102578
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Move jitopt and rpo experiments to PerfVipers #102575
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [mono][interp] Fix type of args when inlining method #102570
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [mobile][infra] Update mobile-related area subscribers #102569
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix calculation of channel bindings hash in managed NTLM implementation #102565
    Servicing-consider, os-android, community-contribution
  • [mono] Don't allocate the renamable vars buffer in the interpreter unless optimizing #102563
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Make `ObjectFactory<T>` covariant #102553
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • ARM64-SVE: LeadingSignCount, LeadingZeroCount, PopCount #102548
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Document the use of non-short-circuiting `|` operator in `Char::IsAsciiLetterOrDigit` #102547
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Use V5 ESRP task with backing MI + AKV #102542
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Periodically flush when using PipeWriter in Json #102541
    area-System.Text.Json
  • [Release/8.0-staging] Fix issue where the IPC server can fully consume a CPU core and prevent incoming connections #102530
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 8.0.x

Merged

  • Commit Accounting related changes #100380
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Build against Y2038-compatible glibc for linux arm32 #102410
  • unblock Unix Domain Socket on Dispose on macOS #101753
    area-System.Net.Sockets, 9.0.0
  • Add ability to dump ILLink traces for all tests #102409
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Arm64/SVE: JitStress/JitStressRegs fixes #102543
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arm-sve
  • Report catch type dependencies in IL scanner #102550
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • couple tweaks to optRemoveRedundantZeroInits #102531
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add support for Sve.Store() #102262
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • [tests] InstallWorkloadFromArtifacts: handle a stable band version #102533
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Migrate to zlib-ng, part 1: copy source code only #102520
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • [STJ] Add support for nullable reference annotations on properties #102499
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • ILLink: Fix event warning locations #102528
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • JIT: Enable RPO-based block layout by default #102343
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, Priority:2
  • Fix the OpenSSL version for EVP_DigestSqueeze #102564
    area-System.Security, 9.0.0
  • Update .gitattributes #100736
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Normalize EOL of the repository #102561
    needs-area-label
  • Modify error message for failed RW mappings #102458
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Handle GT_SWIFT_ERROR_RET in LinearScan::getKillSetForNode #102519
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [S390X] [Cleanup] Remove unused tramp file #102536
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • JIT: Compact blocks in fgMoveBackwardJumpsToSuccessors #102512
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] fix marshaling reject(null) #102549
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Add support for exported types in illink XML formats #102487
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix/baseline baseservices pri 1 tests #102551
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Mark a couple throw helpers StackTraceHidden #102552
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Do not pre-provision wasm, it is not needed anymore #102554
    needs-area-label
  • Add .NET Libraries fuzzing targets and automation #101993
    area-Meta, 9.0.0
  • Temporarily pin 1ES pipeline to unblock official build #102539
    needs-area-label
  • Console.ReadKey should not throw when read returns 0 records #98684
    area-System.Console, 9.0.0
  • `CodeVersionManager` updates #102298
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix publishing PGO assets #102527
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • Fix issue where the IPC server can fully consume a CPU core and prevent incoming connections #102413
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Handle more than 64 registers - Part 2 #102297
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, Priority:2

Updated

  • Expand host_runtime_contract to include the entry assembly and probing paths #100503
    area-Host
  • Add Base64url encoding/decoding #102364
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation
  • In Windows host, use WriteConsoleW for stdout and stderr, and locale enabled print for file output #102295
    area-Host
  • CI test #99871
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Disable W^X in Rosetta emulated x64 containers on macOS #102509
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Migrate to zlib-ng, part 2: consume it in runtime #102403
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • [Ignore] Testing purposes #99467
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [cdac] Implement GetThreadStoreData in cDAC #102404
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Add more complete linux build instructions #101631
    area-Infrastructure
  • Use PayloadReader in System.Resources.Extensions #102379
    area-System.Resources, 9.0.0
  • CI Test #100951
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • [RISC-V] Improve code generating resolve stub assembly #102318
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [browser] Fix debugger support in WasmAppBuilder #100675
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser
  • Simplify utf8.c #102424
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • basic support for TCP fast open #99490
    area-System.Net.Sockets, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • AVX10.1 API introduction in JIT #101938
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0] Fix cancellation unregistration in DataflowBlock.OutputAvailableAsync #102376
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Threading, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0-staging] Transition to 1ES templates (Backport #99433) #102242
    area-Infrastructure
  • [release/8.0] [mono][interp] Keep delegate alive during invocation #102159
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, 8.0.x
  • Windows CNG virtualization-based security #102495
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix 97272 #99818
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add saturating decrement/increment by element count #102315
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • [RISC-V][x64] WiP: Passing empty struct fields #101796
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Provide fix for #81093 - "Mono does not emit ProcessExit event on SIGTERM" #100056
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • [HTTP/3] Support for HTTP/3 multiple connections #101531
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add dynamic allocation sampling following a Poisson process instead of using a static threshold #100356
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Integrate naot-llvm into workload manifest #101801
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 9.0.0
  • Re-enable CertificateValidationClientServer_EndToEnd_Ok in Windows Native AOT #102517
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Tar: support GNU numeric format. #101172
    community-contribution, area-System.Formats.Tar
  • optimize the store/restore for calleeSavedRegs. #101472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Add pseudoinstructions to disassembler #102260
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [RISC-V] Fix invalid operand register in the emitted addition/subtraction code #102074
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Cleanup VARIANT marshalling and convert to managed #102498
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono][interp] Update mono struct lowering to use MonoMemoryManager #102486
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] Fix WebSocket failures on wasm test runs #102366
    arch-wasm
  • Fix zombie LDAP results retriever thread #102526
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • Length guard in ImmutableArray<T>.Builder.RemoveRange #102484
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • [System.Diagnostics.DiagnosticSource] Implement metrics advice API #102524
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [Draft PR] Add user_events support for the native runtime events #102523
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Enable RuntimeType.GenericCache to hold multiple types of cache entries #102034
    area-System.Runtime, runtime-coreclr
  • Switch to AllowByRefLike naming in Mono as well #102516
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • Rewrite the corehost CMake system to be more "Modern CMake"y and less MSBuild-y #102475
    area-Host

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet test fails to load app-local ICU on linux #41077
  • [NETSDKE2E][Regression]With 7.0.317 SDK installed, .Net Host will stop working when creating F# mvc/webapi project. #41076

Closed

  • [NETSDKE2E][intermittent]7.0.120 SDK installation failed with error "A DLL required for this install to complete could not be run..." after allowEnforceSignCI policy enabled. #41078
  • [Installer -> SDK] SDK does not produce MSFT SDK Tarball #40634

PullRequests

Created

  • Add the installer's package table to SDK docs #41098
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [StaticWebAssets] Adds fingerprinting support for assets #41092
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Delete src/SourceBuild/patches/roslyn/0001-ambiguous-call-site.patch #41089
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update DotNetBuild.props #41082
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Fix source-build-sdk-diff-tests pipeline #41090
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'main' #41061
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update generated productCommits.txt files #41075
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Revert "Stop Running SDK Diff Test Pipeline on Branches Affected by Installer -> SDK merge" #41070
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Refactor pipelines and add Installer jobs #40983
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Fix Alpine Target RID #40843
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, DO NOT MERGE
  • Enable the Respecting Item's Culture by default #41042
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-22
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Extensions #5497
    Working Set
  • Proposal: Quadruple precision floats #1252
  • Proposal: Semi-Auto-Properties; `field` keyword #140
    Working Set
  • Open issues: Breaking changes #7918

PullRequests

Created

Merged

  • Propose relaxed ordering for partial and ref modifiers #8134
  • Update `is` pattern section of "first-class Span" #8141

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Inline Hints should snap to the character grid when using a Monospace font. #73649
  • Code snippets do not always appear for insertion, depending on the cursor placement? #73644
  • New warning CS9220 for Razor code using string.Join #73643
  • Editor doesn't respect tab indentation preference when inserting a code snippet #73642
  • Unused imports reported during merge conflict resolution #73641
  • Outlining Failing for Sub with Optional Parameter #73640
  • ReplaceMethodWithPropertyCodeRefactoringProvider crash with System.InvalidOperationException : GetCurrentNode returned null #73637
  • RoslynServiceExtensions should be removed in lieu of IAsyncServiceProvider3 #73636
    17.11
  • VerifyRenameLinkedDocumentsAsync is flakey #73630

Closed

  • "IDE0305 Use collection expression for fluent" not raised if `ToArray()` is assigned to a `var` variable #73638
  • intellisense suggestions constructor collection #73627
  • Respond to obsoletion of ILanguageClientMiddleLayer #73626
    17.11
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-34921.87 #73623
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build feature.debugger.main-34921.105 #73622

PullRequests

Created

  • WIP: ChildSyntaxList.ItemInternal optimization #73650
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Always use a by-value temp to capture a reference type receiver #73631
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Disable saving source texts to memory mapped files on non-Windows platforms #73628
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Drop roslyn impact on scrolling perf by 30% #73648
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Work around crash in Document Outline #73564
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Update to simple using statements #73632
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Ignore drive casing when comparing on windows platforms #73380
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Cache classification services #73635
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Ignore the commits that update us to FileScopedNamespaces #73647
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Switch to file scoped namespace for tests #73634
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Optimize syntactic classification walk #73629
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Switch to AsNode extension #73645
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Simplify code in ForAttributeWithMetadataName #73646
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.9 to release/dev17.10 #73595
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts, Needs API Review
  • Add object browser support for ref struct interfaces #73621
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Remove unused usings #73633
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Avoid searching entire trees when looking for implicit constructors in find-refs #73625
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Use semantics to check for readonly struct #72893
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Add signature help support for ref struct interfaces #73624
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Switch SG mode to 'balanced' by default #73618
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Add extract method support for ref struct interfaces #73619
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Adjust receiver in instance invocations #73501
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Clean up Razor EA #73040
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add standard implicit array-to-Span conversions #73577
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - First-class Span Types
  • Return the SignatureHelp items nearest to the cursor #73606
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Shipping tasks #73617
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Partial properties: public API and IDE features #73603
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Optimize codegen for collections expression of single spread of `ReadOnlySpan` for collection builder emit strategy #73102
    Area-Compilers, Blocked, Community, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2458425 #73415
    auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.10 to release/dev17.11 #73413
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Ensure that when EnC finishes that it disposes the OOP connection it is holding onto #73465
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Strengthen language version tests for Ref Struct Interfaces #73607
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces
  • Fix build warnings observed locally #73593
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Always use DiagnosticHelper.Create for diagnostics with options #73339
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • WebApplicationFactory failing to replace registrations in Background Service #55845
  • Blazor pages from RCL does not work in net8 #55843
  • Perf regression: plainTextWithFilter #55842
  • Perf improvement: plaintext #55841
  • [9.0-preview.5] Endpoint with nullable parameter no longer generates code with Request Delegate Generator #55840
  • ActionResult OK returns 204 on an empty payload instead of 200 #55835
  • When using the alpine:latest base image in Docker with .NET Core 8.0, the DateTime format may not work correctly. #55834
  • [9.0-preview.4] OpenAPI response does get served if a static file with the same path exists as a file #55833
  • [9.0-preview.4] Remove x-aspnetcore-id from OpenAPI responses #55832
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.NavigationException:“Exception_WasThrown” #55831

Closed

  • Build in AuthenticationStateProviders from Blazor Web templates #52769
    9.0-preview5
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, mapaction #55828
  • Perf regression: plainTextEmptyFilter #55829
  • ResponseCookies.Delete(key, cookieOptions) doesn't delete cookie if the caller provides a non-null max-age #52159
    9.0-preview4
  • [9.0-preview.4] OpenAPI operations are missing the ID #55838
  • Consider increasing the default iteration count for PBKDF2 to follow OWASP recommendation #55690
  • Test crash in Libuv.FunctionalTests on (Alpine.314.Amd64.Open)Ubuntu.2004.Amd64.Open in 6.0 #50403
  • Best Practices - Call Blazor base lifecycle method first / always #55839
  • The runtime<->aspnetcore shared src is out of sync #18943
  • UseRateLimiter() does not work when called after UseMvc() #55826
  • [Aot] Incorrect serialization when async api #55827
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudListProducts #55825

PullRequests

Created

  • Add HTML title attribute to "th" elements #55837
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Microsoft.extensions.api description.server allow specifying environment #55836
    area-commandlinetools, community-contribution

Merged

  • Support passing OpenAPI spec version and document name via dotnet-getdocument #55823
    area-commandlinetools, feature-openapi, 9.0-preview5
  • Build in AuthenticationStateProviders from project templates #55821
    area-blazor, 9.0-preview5
  • Update .NET SDK to 9.0.100-preview.5.24269.5 #55800
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:, 9.0-preview5
  • Sync shared code from runtime #55830
    area-runtime, 9.0-preview5
  • Switch to dnceng pool for SDL tasks #55090
    area-infrastructure

Updated

  • Update branding to preview6 #55846
    area-infrastructure
  • [Blazor] Updated Blazor Server reconnect UI #55723
    area-blazor
  • Allow HTTP2 encoder to split headers across frames #55322
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • [release/6.0] Switch to dynamic cert gen for tests #55811
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • Fix for issue #54500: Middleware keyed dependency injection #55722
    community-contribution, area-middleware
  • Fixed LDAP nested group claims #55707
    community-contribution, area-security
  • Add separate activities for Hub methods #55439
    area-signalr, pending-ci-rerun

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-22
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Clarify whether dotnet-counters can monitor .NET Framework app #4597
    9.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Cannot install maui-android workload on Ubuntu 24.04 in Docker #22588
  • [Android] Convert Modal Implementation over to using Dialog Fragment #22587
    .NET 9 Planning
  • iOS Notification Service Extension Deploy Fails #22586
  • Provide a formalized mechanism with BindableObjects, so we can update the values but not trigger a handler update #22585
    .NET 9 Planning
  • SwipeView Items could not be centered vertically when content is multirow grid #22581
    Backlog
  • SwipeView shows what's beneath while still swiping #22580
    Backlog
  • Unable to debug MAUI android source code as it contains the bug because VS 2022 cannot find source symbol files #22577
  • Maui.Controls.Compatibility.StackLayout; add children, chidlren.clear, re-add children -> System.Object.DisposedException #22575
  • RowDefinitions=Star not rendering properly (Xamarin migration) #22571
    Backlog
  • iOS flyoutmenu with flyout content as collectionview doesn't respect flyout width #22567
  • [Android] Disabled Picker view intercepts GestureRecognizer of parent container #22565
    Backlog
  • Issue with Drawing View in TabbedPage #22564
    Backlog
  • Simple shell navigation causes Microsoft.UI.Xaml.Controls.Frame.NavigationFailed was unhandled. #22563
    Backlog

Closed

  • Binding Border.StrokeShape stopped working in 8.0.60-ci.net8.10665 #22549
    .NET 8 SR6
  • Radiobutton custom content is not displaying on Android #7881
    Backlog
  • Bindings to Width and Height of a Control never stop triggering, even if size did not change at all. #22432
    .NET 8 SR6
  • Top most ListView bound to an ObservableCollection, does not always update list of records, when adding or removing new items #22569
  • Exception using <Frame> in a databound ListView on Android #22568
  • Newly installed VS 2022 In combination with Microsoft.Maui.Controls and Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Compativility leads to The type or namespace name 'MauiWinUIApplication' does not exist in the namespace 'Microsoft.Maui' #22515
  • [Android] MAUI 8.0.3 -> 8.0.6 regression: custom handler with key listener no longer works #21109
    Backlog
  • ImageButton Padding stops working with .NET 8 #22364
    .NET 8 SR6
  • ImageButton ripple effect stops working with .NET 8 #18857
    .NET 8 SR6
  • Android Java Library Binding breaks intellisense, despite build/run working #21777
    Backlog
  • Cross TabBar navigation broken on iOS #22570
  • [Android & iOS]: In ListView with IsPullToRefreshEnabled enabled the PullToRefresh activity indicator remains stuck and doesnt get closed in .net 8 MAUI #22532
  • Window.SizeChanged fired moving MainWindow #17991
    Backlog
  • [Android] Geolocation IsListeningForeground property is always false #21439

PullRequests

Created

  • IllegalArgumentException when changing number of tabbar pages - fix #22589

Merged

  • [XC] Compile TemplateBindingExtension #22008

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor Hybrid Entity Framework Migration: deps.Json is not created in Android folder #33789
  • Add support for value converters to HasDbFunction in order to better support value objects #33788
  • Large TestResults files #33787
  • Sqlite.FunctionalTests intermittently crash on MacOS #33785
    Backlog
  • Access beyond end of array returns null, which can lead to us returning incorrect results #33784
  • Cosmos: support vector search #33783
  • Sequence annotations are not passed to code generation #33780
  • Cosmos: supporting projecting out arrays directly, without wrapping in an object #33779
    Backlog
  • Add a seeding method that can be called form the cli #33778

Closed

  • How to fix `The 'X' property 'Y' on entity type 'Z' is configured with a database-generated default` warnings for existing database? #33769
  • System.ExecutionEngineException or System.NullReferenceException in DetectChanges #33763

PullRequests

Created

  • Bump SQLitePCLRaw from 2.1.7 to 2.1.8 #33790
  • Publish binaries for BinSkim #33786
  • Clean up query translator/expression namespace and file placement #33782
  • Pass sequence annotations (#33780) #33781
  • Simplify `TRUE = expr` in filtering contexts #33776

Merged

  • update branding for preview 5 #33777

Updated

  • Fix comparison of nullable values #33757
  • OTEL implementation, so far matching EventCounters infrastructure. #33633
  • Add precompiled query generation to the dbcontext optimize command #33747

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-22
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Uninstall not work #12612
  • Installation #12025
  • Add link to nightly Linux Snap package? #11387
  • Run scenario tests as part of installer/source-build PRs #17166

Updated

    6.0.1xx

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #19836
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #19831

Merged

  • [release/6.0.1xx] Update 6.0 source-build CI distro matrix #19828
  • [release/8.0.3xx-staging] Remove PGO builds #19830

  • [release/8.0.1xx-staging] Remove PGO builds #19829
    Servicing-consider, Area-Infrastructure
